statements: DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND receiver = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver = 'Alice' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND sender = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Mobile Phone' AND user_id = '6ba8e131-45a7-49e4-9eb1-76f05d0baece';
DELETE FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com')
